description: The base of operations for the Arlong Pirates, a fortress-like structure where Arlong rules over the Cocoyasi Village region. Features a large pool and multiple buildings.

keyEvents.title: Sanji vs Kuroobi on Land
keyEvents.description: After the underwater battle, Sanji forces Kuroobi to fight on land at Arlong Park, where he defeats him.
keyEvents.significance: The location where Sanji proves human determination can overcome fish-man advantages.

keyEvents.title: Nami Arrives at Arlong Park
keyEvents.description: Nami arrives at Arlong Park, ready to confront Arlong directly and fight for her freedom.
keyEvents.significance: The climactic location where Nami will finally face her oppressor.

keyEvents.title: Nami Declares War on Arlong
keyEvents.description: Nami confronts Arlong at his base, declaring her intent to destroy everything he's built.
keyEvents.significance: Marks the beginning of the final confrontation in the Arlong Park arc.

statusHistory.reason: Arlong Park serves as the main battleground during this arc

name.japanese: アーロンパークのプール

description: A large pool within Arlong Park where fish-men have a significant advantage in combat. Features in the battle between Sanji and Kuroobi.

keyEvents.title: Sanji vs Kuroobi Underwater Battle
keyEvents.description: Sanji engages Kuroobi in an underwater battle in the pool, where the fish-man has a severe advantage.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates the natural superiority fish-men have in water and tests Sanji's limits.

keyEvents.title: Kuroobi's Fish-Man Karate Display
keyEvents.description: Kuroobi demonstrates multiple Fish-Man Karate techniques while dominating Sanji underwater.
keyEvents.significance: Showcases how deadly Fish-Man Karate is in its ideal environment.

statusHistory.reason: The pool serves as a battleground during the Arlong Park arc

name.japanese: アーロンパークの敷地

description: The outdoor area surrounding Arlong Park, including forested areas and paddy fields where various battles take place.

keyEvents.title: Usopp's Ketchup Star Deception
keyEvents.description: Usopp uses his Ketchup Star to fake being defeated in the grounds around Arlong Park.

keyEvents.title: Usopp vs Chew - Round Two
keyEvents.description: Usopp challenges Chew to a rematch in the grounds of Arlong Park.
keyEvents.significance: The location where Usopp proves his bravery.

keyEvents.title: Usopp Defeats Chew
keyEvents.description: Usopp defeats Chew using clever tactics in the grounds of Arlong Park.
keyEvents.significance: Proves that intelligence can overcome physical strength.

statusHistory.reason: Active battleground during the Arlong Park arc
